OpenSim::CustomJoint

CustomJoint Class Reference

#include <CustomJoint.h>

Inheritance diagram for CustomJoint:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class implementing a custom joint.

The underlying joint in Simbody is a custom mobilizer.

Author:
Frank C. Anderson
Version:
1.0

Member Data Documentation

PropertyObj _transformSetProp [protected]

Set of transforms defining how the child body moves with respect to the parent body as a function of the generalized coordinates.

Up to six independent spacial transformations can be defined.

TransformAxisSet& _transformSet [protected]
